semantic_identifier: [GOLD-36]: Add representative example accounts to Fit Score explainability payload
title: Add representative example accounts to Fit Score explainability payload

sections.text: Extend the explainability service to return a small set of representative “example accounts” for the evaluated segment (e.g., high-fit, medium-fit, low-fit), including account ID, name, and Fit Score. Define deterministic selection criteria (recency + data completeness + score bucket) to avoid noisy or unstable results between runs. Ensure the API/SDK response is backward-compatible and add unit tests for bucket selection and empty/low-signal segments.
